synopsis.text:
Xin Lu's perilous journey unfolds in the anime adaptation of Heishan Laogui's novel, 'Starting from Red Moon.' The narrative plunges viewers into a post-apocalyptic world, where a blood-red moon looms ominously in the skyâ€”a historical event known as the Red Moon catastrophe. To safeguard the remnants of humanity, survivors seek refuge within the fortified walls of High Wall City.

However, the calamity has triggered mental mutations among some survivors. Those unable to control their mutations emit a deadly mental plague and radiation, contaminating the surrounding populace and jeopardizing the fragile existence of the remaining humans.

To combat the contamination source, High Wall City creates a specialized cleanup department, recruiting individuals capable of harnessing spiritual energy. Undeterred by the danger, our protagonist, Lu Xin, aspires to join the most hazardous cleanup division. Will Lu Xin succeed in his mission to restore safety and order to High Wall City? Join him on his thrilling adventure to find out!
